Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Technique: WRITTEN WITH A REED PEN/REED WITH SPLIT NIB
Name: Literary papyrus
Description: This group results from a connection, the two small fragments P. Lille 91 (a-b) having found their place in immediate junction. One may note there the use of a verbal form (lines 17-18) that evokes the language and the style of Lysias.
